sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"调查，检查"之意。
means: examine ： 最普通用词，可指粗略地查看，也可指仔细观察或调查以确定事物的性质、功能、特点等。
inspect ： 侧重按一定质量标准检查某物，找出不足或不同之处。
investigate ： 指为发现事实真相或了解掌握情况而进行深入细致的现场考察。
scan ： 原义是仔细地检查分析，现用于指细看或浏览。

sentence.Network_en: I'll start with some generalities and then examine a few specific examples.
sentence.Network_cn: 我首先进行概述，然后会分析几个实例。

sentence.Network_en: We examine the wording in detail before deciding on the final text.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们彻底仔细地检查了措词后才最终定稿。

sentence.Network_en: Doctors examine their patients thoroughly in order to make a correct diagnosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了作出准确的诊断，医生会对病人进行彻底的检查。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... ought to 应当；应该 examine vt 检查 plenty n 充足；大量；富裕.
初中英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... exam = examination n. 考试，测试；检查；审查 examine vt. 检查；诊察 example n. 例子；榜样.
冰与火之歌单词 - 豆丁网 ... evil 邪恶的, 坏的 examine 检查，调查，审问动词 Examining n. 的现在分词形式.
考_百度百科 ... ◎ 考 kǎo ◎考查[ examine;check] ◎考场[ examination hall or room].

list.abs: 英语作文网-最全的英语作文网 ... ·谈谈自己的爱好- My hobby ·考试- Examination ·我的背包- My Backpack.
美国法庭词汇翻译 | 法律英语翻译 ... evidence 证据 examination 审查,发问,盘问 exclusionary rule 排除不合法证据的法规.
china-translation.com tu dien anh-hoa ... examination lamp 检眼灯 examiner 检查者 examining chair 诊查椅.
专利翻译词汇及译法 - 译员进阶-翻译论坛 ... examination 审查 examiner 审查员 examiner’s report 审查员报告.

means.word_mean: 检查;细查;考察;考虑;分析

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French examiner, from Latin examinare 'weigh, test', from examen (see examen).

entry.def: If you examine something, you look at it carefully.

example.ex: He examined her passport and stamped it...
example.tran: 他仔细检查了她的护照，然后在上面盖了章。

example.ex: Forensic scientists are examining what police believe to have been the bombers' car.
example.tran: 法医学家正在对一辆警方怀疑属于投弹者的汽车进行仔细检查。

entry.def: If a doctor examines you, he or she looks at your body, feels it, or does simple tests in order to check how healthy you are.

example.ex: Another doctor examined her and could still find nothing wrong...
example.tran: 另外一名医生对她进行了诊察，仍旧没有发现任何问题。

example.ex: He was examined again and then prescribed a different herbal medicine.
example.tran: 医生又对他诊察了一遍，然后开了另外一种草药。

entry.def: If an idea, proposal, or plan is examined, it is considered very carefully.

example.ex: I have given the matter much thought, examining all the possible alternatives...
example.tran: 这个问题我已经考虑了很多，分析了各种可能的选择。

example.ex: The plans will be examined by EU environment ministers.
example.tran: 欧盟各国环境部部长将仔细研究这些计划。

entry.def: If you are examined, you are given a formal test in order to show your knowledge of a subject.

example.ex: ...learning to cope with the pressures of being judged and examined by our teachers.
example.tran: 学会应对老师评判和测验时的压力

means.word_mean: 1. consider in detail and subject to an analysis in order to discover essential features or meaning;

sentences.sentence: "analyze the evidence in a criminal trial"

means.word_mean: 2. observe, check out, and look over carefully or inspect;

sentences.sentence: "I must see your passport before you can enter the country"

means.word_mean: 3. question or examine thoroughly and closely
5. put to the test, as for its quality, or give experimental use to;

sentences.sentence: "This approach has been tried with good results"

auth_sentence.content: Meanwhile, my team continues to examine escape behavior.
auth_sentence.res_content: Meanwhile, my team continues to examine escape behavior.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Meanwhile, my team continues to examine escape behavior.

auth_sentence.content: How much we ought to...examine and humiliate our selves.
auth_sentence.res_content: How much we ought to...examine and humiliate our selves.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How much we ought to...examine and humiliate our selves.

auth_sentence.content: During the season, we will examine that imbalance.
auth_sentence.res_content: During the season, we will examine that imbalance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: During the season, we will examine that imbalance.

Sentence.sentence: It is vulnerable to criticism if the statistics are closely examined.
Evaluating Risks To decide whether a risk is worth taking, you must examine the consequences, in the future as well as right now, negative as well as positive, and to others as well as to yourself.
To examine how long it takes dolphins to acquire a skill.

sentences.en: All candidates must first be orally examined.
sentences.cn: 所有的考生必须先参加口试。

sentences.en: The policeman examined the suspicious man.
sentences.cn: 警察盘问了那个可疑的人。

sentences.en: The judge examined the principal witness.

jushi.english: People always examine and handle problems in the light of their own experience.
jushi.chinese: 人们总是根据自己的经验来观察问题和处理问题。

jushi.english: He examined every thing, every drawing in the museum.
jushi.chinese: 他在博物馆内仔细地观看了每件东西、每幅图画。

jushi.english: I examined the door and found it was locked.
jushi.chinese: 我查看过门,发现是锁了的。
